extendedInfo.description: MERRY CHRISTMAS! Take the Christmas quiz challenge and prove that you really have the festive spirit: Ho, ho, ho!Test your knowledge of all things festive with this fun interactive quiz experience. Question topics include Christmas movies, stories, carols and popular music, interesting festive facts, food and drink and Xmas traditions from around the world. Featuring 500 questions, this fun and educational quiz will get you in the Christmas mood.Answer sets of questions in rounds of 10, or in a continuous stream. If you think you know it all then crank up the tension with the question countdown timer for an even greater challenge. In the 'Timer Play' contestants in the hot seat are under increased pressure to correctly answer questions before the time runs out!Take your knowledge further by visiting videos and web content about each question.Be inspired by fascinating facts from Christmas past and wonderful carols that conjure up happy family days. This quiz is perfect for sharing with friends and family members, and as a fun Christmas party activity!

reviews.title: Its good but...
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t let you get past level 488!! Even though you\'ve answered more questions!! Also theres loads of questions to do with America!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I don\'t know
reviews.comment: I don\'t know about this game but I could be great
reviews.author: A Google User
